publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3879 Linda Fabiani: Scotland’s Olympic Team—That the Parliament welcomes the call by the Danish Minister for Culture, Brian Mikkelsen, for Denmark’s devolved territories to have their own Olympic teams; notes his comments that "it won’t be easy, but it has been possible for other home rule territories to become independent members of the IOC"; contrasts his actions with those of ministers in Whitehall and in Edinburgh, and calls on the Scottish Executive to back the forming of a Scottish Olympic team in time for the 2012 Olympics in London.

S2M-3879 Linda Fabiani: Scotland’s Olympic Team—That the Parliament welcomes the call by the Danish Minister for Culture, Brian Mikkelsen, for Denmark’s devolved territories to have their own Olympic teams; notes his comments that "it won’t be easy, but it has been possible for other home rule territories to become independent members of the IOC"; contrasts his actions with those of ministers in Whitehall and in Edinburgh, and calls on the Scottish Executive to back the forming of a Scottish Olympic team in time for the 2012 Olympics in London.
S2M-3879 Scotland’s Olympic Team (lodged on 26 January 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3879 Scotland’s Olympic Team (lodged on 26 January 2006) Michael Matheson*

S2M-3879 Scotland’s Olympic Team (lodged on 26 January 2006) Jim Mather*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alasdair Morgan*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr John Swinney*, Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3879 Scotland’s Olympic Team (lodged on 26 January 2006) Bruce Crawford*
S2M-3879 Scotland’s Olympic Team (lodged on 26 January 2006) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
